page.description: Formats a date value using a user defined format string
page.syntax: Formatted_Date_Time_String as C = date_format(D date ,C custom_date_format )

argument.name: Formatted_Date_Time_String
argument.description: Any portion(s) of a date time value in the specified format.

argument.name: date
argument.description: A representation of a date that satisfies the ISDATE()function.

argument.name: custom_date_format
argument.description: Refer to Date and Time Format Elements. To include separators in the formatted result, include separators in the format string. For example, "MON, d-yyyy". To use a format code a separator, precede the code with the escape character ("\").

page.discussion: DATE_FORMAT() returns a formatted character string representation of the Date_Value.
page.example: dim dateString as C Date_String = date_format(DATE() , "MON, d-yyyy") Date_String ? "JAN, 6-2003"
